recordId.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionDraftOrRevise.InvocableActionInputRecordIdLabel}
recordId.einstein:description: The primary Salesforce record ID used to retrieve the main recipient's email address. Must be an 18-digit string.

additionalRecordIds.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionDraftOrRevise.InvocableActionInputAdditionalRecordIdsLabel}
additionalRecordIds.einstein:description: Optional list of additional Salesforce record IDs to retrieve more recipients' email addresses.

userInput.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionDraftOrRevise.InvocableActionUserInputLabel}
userInput.einstein:description: A string containing instructions for drafting or revising the email.

supportiveTextualData.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionDraftOrRevise.InvocableActionInputSupportiveTextualDataLabel}
supportiveTextualData.einstein:description: All textual data that may be relevant to drafting the email. It may include conversation history and prior action results.

latestEmailDraft.title: {!$Label.InvocableActionDraftOrRevise.InvocableActionLatestEmailDraftLabel}
latestEmailDraft.einstein:description: A JSON object containing the latest version of the email draft. Required only when the user wants to revise an earlier draft. The email must be retrieved from the conversation history.
